documentation.text: @notice Prepares the minimum amount of staked BKD required by a keeper
@notice Sets the minimum amount of staked BKD required by a keeper to the prepared value
@notice Returns true if the given keeper has enough staked BKD to execute actions
@return Returns the minimum amount of staked BKD required by a keeper

@return the total amount of ETH require by `payer` to cover the fees for
 positions registered in all actions

canKeeperExecuteAction(address).notice: Returns true if the given keeper has enough staked BKD to execute actions

executeKeeperRequiredStakedBKD().notice: Sets the minimum amount of staked BKD required by a keeper to the prepared value

returns._0: Returns the minimum amount of staked BKD required by a keeper
the total amount of ETH require by `payer` to cover the fees for positions registered in all actions

prepareKeeperRequiredStakedBKD(uint256).notice: Prepares the minimum amount of staked BKD required by a keeper
